subject: Soccer
UEFA Champions League (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Jürgen Klopp has built a club in Dortmund that consistently wins on an affordable payroll, so it is no surprise that many think he may soon head to one of the bigger clubs in Europe.
snippet: Jürgen Klopp has built a club in Dortmund that consistently wins on an affordable payroll, so it is no surprise that many think he may soon head to one of the bigger clubs in Europe.
